attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I was told the home page has cute dogs. i opened the app and immediately saw a hairy, orange, wrinkly, old man. i was disgusted and petrified. my cousin later was looking at my phone and went on the app. she saw the old man and went into cardiac arrest. her last words were, “he was so ugly (gasp for air) and so so orange”. she then died. this happened to more people i knew once they were bamboozled into getting the app. the more of the app they saw, the worse the condition. don’t recommend this app because you may die too ✨✨✨
attributes.title: This app made my cousin have a heart attack

attributes.review:
Wouldn’t it truly be a shame if word got out that if an app in the AppStore received ratings so low they would be forced to remove it...

Wow, this app is terrible. It literally caused a sharp increase in COVID 19 cases! It also used racial and xenophobic slurs continually. After a voice recording from President Tr*mp told me that he would turn the country into a fascist police state and crush those who opposed him! Then in the hangman section I couldn’t decide if the missing letter in “ra_ist” was a perfect or ‘c.’ Do not get this app, most likely it will end up destroying our country before too long.
attributes.title: Wouldn’t it be a shame...

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to get updates on Trump and his Presidential Campaign what I got instead is HORRIFYING!!! This downloaded a HORRIBLE virus to all my electronically devices INCLUDING my tv. I had to purchase all new devices. It sends notifications every minute, which is EXTREMELY annoying. I turned off the notifications yet I STILL received them. The setup of this app makes no sense. I can hardly access any of the information because of the HORRIBLE setup of this app. I AM SO DISAPPOINTED THAT THE PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED STATES PUT OUT AN APP AS HORRIBLE AND UNORGANIZED AS THIS ONE. but at the same he is horrible so i can’t say i’m surprised.
attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP

attributes.review: This app is horrible I went to get some coffee yesterday and they turned into chicken nuggets!!! So then I decided to go brush my teeth and my sink said “I only like my water if it’s American” like what the heck! I DONT CARE WAT WATER IT IS!! So then I went to go tell my mom and saw Michael Jackson sitting in her room I said “what are u doing in my moms room!” He said “hEHe” then i knew what was going on the government put cameras in my room and stuffed dinosaurs under my bed”! I then asked my sleep paralysis demon do u think lemonade or pink lemonade is good he said “crocodile”!!        And this is why u shouldn’t download this app.
attributes.title: Why this app is not my sunshine!!!

attributes.review: As soon as you launch the app is starts shouting out racial slurs and telling me to go back to my country. I would have NEVER expected the leader of our country to say such things, I am shocked not surprised. Then a picture of a person who looked like they had a skid mark on their face appeared, I am assuming that is Mr. Trump. It was so difficult to not projectile vomit onto my phone screen, and I failed to hold back the contents of my stomach. Now my phone permanently smells of bile and warm Takis because that’s what I had for a snack this evening. I am not pleased. #getthisskidmarkoffmyscreen
attributes.title: Terrible, horrible and no good

attributes.review: The app was faulty, had many glitches and the news was too Conservative party oriented. It clearly supported the Trump ideals of racism, sexism, homophobia and general inequality, so I do not recommend this platform. Also, it would completely slow my phone down and caused it to crash. There was also several windows it would somehow open and these took hours to delete. I WOULD GIVE THE APP ZERO STARS IF I COULD!!!! Additionally it would be much better if the app was deleted completely and I hope it does. I do not recommend this app to anyone who has the correct mindset and is sane.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVERRRRRR 🤬🤬

attributes.review: This app is the worse I have ever had. Words do not explain how terrible this app is. So many bugs. There is glitching. I experience lag. The facts are incorrect. To many ads. They Attack you.  Viruses everywhere. I got so many viruses from this app I had to get a new phone. I should sue after it broke my phone. This is single handedly THE worst app I have had and I do NOT recommend to others!
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: It will steal your tv and all your pets!!! So I was watching tv and I was just chilling being cool and stuff then I had to go feed my pet  snake and it was gone then I looked for my pet it was dead-wait I did that- but anyway all my pets were gone and they were all trying but bite my leg off or hurt me in some way so I went back up stairs to watch tv then my tv is gone so then I open my lab top to watch Netflix and there was a virus on it and it showed my TV and MY PETS locked in a CAGE!!! Then to get them back I had to turn in a republican so I just got a new tv and some new pets. THE END
attributes.title: VERY BAD APP

attributes.review:
It all started on a Monday when i wanted to expand my knowledge on our president. As soon as I got the app my phone started smelling really stinky😖🤮🤮.i was trying my hardest to turn it off when it started playing ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨i🙁don't😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆. I immediately started crying and then I started burping uncontrollably😾😾. I tried walking out of the house but I ran into an obnoxiously large Cheeto puff👹!! Then out of nowhere a huge chicken started attacking me!!🤕🤕 I knew this gruesome app was the cause of this. DO NOT BUY THIS STINKY APP IF YOU DON’T WANT 
THIS TO HAPPEN TO YOU.💩🤒🤢
attributes.title: So smelly and offensive🤢😾

attributes.review: oh my gosh! ☺️☺️ I got this app because I thought that I would fine factual information🥵 about donald trump and the work he is doing within our country. 🥰🥰🥰🥴🥰 boy was I wrong. it’s full of lies😳. right when you open the app, there is a picture of a white supremacist with the caption “keep america great” 🤪. like DUUUDDEE. who is it great for??? white cis hets??? idek maybe it’s just me but this kinda of blatant falsehood is so toxic and is literally responsible for the deaths of so many people. I’m not much for cancel culture but donald trump should not have a platform at all. love y’all!! bye!
attributes.title: does not accurately represent our president !!!
